title: AigentPro
description: A comprehensive Electron app for real estate professionals featuring AI-powered document generation, negotiation support, and secure document management.
fullDescription: AIgent Pro is a production-ready Electron application designed for real estate professionals to streamline offer preparation, negotiation support, and document management. It features advanced role-based authentication with agent verification and client onboarding, AI-powered document generation using GPT-4 for creating context-aware cover letters and negotiation strategies, and professional document management with customizable branding. The platform includes negotiation support tools with interactive dashboards and AI-powered strategy recommendations, secure document sharing with granular permissions and analytics, and a mobile-responsive design optimized for field agents with offline capabilities. AIgent Pro integrates cutting-edge AI capabilities with practical real estate workflows to help agents work more efficiently and close deals faster.
